price: 62. Mpo nakomisela bino sango ya Nkolo wa ngai mpe napesa bino ntoli. Mpe nayebi epai ya Allah, maye bino boyebi te.
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنصَحُ لَكُمۡ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anṣaḥu lakum wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
